channel.title: 001Life Lessons of a Traveling Quilt Artist
channel.description: Bonnie McCaffery tells short stories about her travels
channel.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Bonnie McCaffery tells short stories about her travels
channel.itunes:summary: Bonnie Lyn McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, tells short philosophical stories about her travel adventures. Find out whats new at BonnieMcCaffery.com
channel.itunes:keywords: Life Lessons, creativity, Quilt, artist, fiber artist, philosophy, stories, Bonnie McCaffery, art.
